attributes.action: Stop funding charities that pay executives and employees excessive wages
attributes.background:
Charities are funded & given huge sums of money from the government with out any conditions & this money is rarely used for the purpose it was intended 
instead it is mostly put in the pockets of its employees in the form of extortionate wages employee wages including executives should be capped

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular, we aren't sure what you mean by "excessive". 

Charities are accountable to their trustees for their spending and are regulated by the Charity Commission. If you have evidence that a charity is being run for personal profit you can make a complaint to them here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/charity-commission
